TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

Docs.summary: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>類別會維護所指的是該簽發者的名稱對應的每個受信任的簽發者憑證的受信任簽發者的字典。 憑證會指定使用 ASN.1 編碼的憑證指紋的格式。 簽發者名稱可以是任何字串，只要它是唯一的應用程式範圍內。 可以透過存取此字典<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>屬性。 此類別只可以解決 X.509 憑證。
將底下的項目新增組態檔中指定的受信任簽發者對應[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目。 `<trustedIssuers>`元素是子元素[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目，而且這是有效的時機<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>中指定類別`type`該項目的屬性。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱各項目中的文件[WIF 組態結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)。 如需簽發者名稱登錄的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry>類別。
您可以從衍生<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>來實作您自己的組態架構的簽發者名稱登錄。 您覆寫的方法視您的實作。 例如，您可以覆寫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>從自訂組態結構描述載入組態的方法。
## Examples 下列 XML 顯示設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry>加入集合的安全性權杖處理常式。 `<trustedIssuers>`行為類似傳統的.NET 組態集合的項目允許`<add>`，`<delete>`和`<clear>`子項目的項目。
``` <system.identityModel> <identityConfiguration> <securityTokenHandlersCollection> <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> <issuerNameRegistry type="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry, System.IdentityModel"> <trustedIssuers> <add thumbprint="97249e … 158de" name="contoso.com" /> </trustedIssuers> </issuerNameRegistry> </securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> </identityConfiguration> </system.identityModel> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddTrustedIssuer (string certificateThumbprint, string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddTrustedIssuer(string certificateThumbprint, string name) cil managed
Public Sub AddTrustedIssuer (certificateThumbprint As String, name As String)
public: void AddTrustedIssuer(System::String ^ certificateThumbprint, System::String ^ name);

Docs.param: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
Docs.summary: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫這個方法可加入至簽發者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>字典。 在衍生類別中，您可以呼叫這個方法從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法，將簽發者加入至字典。

Docs.exception: is or empty. -or- is or empty.
The issuer specified by has already been configured. (The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.
Docs.value: 字典，其中包含受信任的簽發者。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典的索引鍵是指紋的 ASN.1 編碼格式的受信任簽發者憑證，而值是指紋的簽發者名稱。 字典中包含組態中所指定的簽發者並新增任何其他簽發者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The security token for which the issuer name is requested. Should be assignable as .
Docs.summary: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.
Docs.returns: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作搜尋<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>字典中指定的 X.509 憑證的指紋`securityToken`。 如果找到項目，則會傳回簽發者名稱。否則，`null`傳回。 如果`securityToken`無法從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>，`null`傳回。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

Docs.param: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.
Docs.summary: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)從組態檔項目。 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，視您為您衍生的類別定義組態結構描述。
設定基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。 預設實作會載入組態從[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目 (設定之下[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目)。 您可以覆寫此方法以提供您自己的自訂組態項目，衍生類別中的支援。

Docs.exception: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
